Posts.Content: Feb 27, 2009 07:48PM beckbeck220 wrote: thank you for your reply.  I ended up going to my gyno and she made me an appt to have a diagnostic mammo and ultrasound done next week and scheduled me to see a surgeon.  Fingers crossed, it's nothing!!!
Posts.Title: half liquid half solid lump beckbeck220 beckbeck220

Posts.Content: beckbeck220 wrote: I am 27.  I first found a lump in my right breast when I was 15.  Went to the doc and had an ultrasound done on it.  Doc said it was half liquid and half solid but nothing to worry about.  So I thought nothing else about it really.  For the past three years I haven't been able to feel it.  I thought it had went away.  A couple days ago, I started to feel it again.  Could this ever become a problem or is it still nothing to worry about?  Or, could the original one have went away and is this a new lump?  Thanks in advance for any advice anyone can give me.  God bless!
